universum.studios.android.ui.widget

Class WidgetGravity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.Gravity
      • universum.studios.android.ui.widget.WidgetGravity

  • public final class WidgetGravity
extends Gravity
    Utility class that supports features related to Gravity for backward compatibility.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean RTL_SUPPORT
      Boolean flag indicating whether the current Android version supports RTL layout direction.
